cheatsheet.title: Using Different Departments in the Portal

intro.description: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of entering department data and checking the worklist depending on this data.

item.title: Triggering the Process
item.description:
Create the departments:
1. Switch to the Workflow Perspective.
2. In the My Startable Processes section, trigger the Report Demo process two times by clicking its entry two times.

item.title: Entering Department Data
item.description:
1. Log out and login as user User1.
This user is assigned to the organization HeadOffice and the role NationalDirector in the department USA.
Thus he first has two entries in the worklist of the HeadOffice organization.
2. Start the first activity in the worklist.
3. Enter Germany as value for the department.
4. Complete the activity.

item.title: Checking the Resulting Worklist
item.description:
1. Log out and login as user User2.
2. The subsequent activity Activity by Scoped NationalDirector goes to the worklist of user User2 as he is associated with department Germany.
